page.title: 18COUNCILLOR KENNEDY
page.content: Councillor Kennedy has been a County Councillor for 4 years.He wanted to be a councillor because he wished to be involved in community life.He is responsible for 11 schools.He represents the Spilsby,Alford and Partney area.The main complaints he receives are about schools and the problems with them.He is on the education and police committees.He would like to see more finance in the future.Mr Kennedy is in the Concervative party.He chose that party beacause it represented his points of view.Mr Kennedy comes from North America.He is a Canadian and is married to a school teacher.
